hero.title: Statistics
hero.subtitle: The mathematics of data. Learn probability, distributions, and inference.

content.text: Algebra and basic probability concepts. Understanding of functions and graphs recommended.
Upon completing this course, you will be able to:

items: Describe and analyze data with descriptive statistics
Make inferences using estimation and hypothesis testing
Understand and apply regression and correlation
Apply statistical thinking to real-world problems

content.text: Basic probability concepts. Conditional probability. Independence and dependence.
Binomial, normal, and other distributions. Properties and applications.
Summarizing data. Measures of center and spread. Visualization and interpretation.
Point and interval estimation. Confidence intervals. Standard error and margin of error.
Formulating hypotheses. Test statistics and p-values. Type I and II errors.
Correlation analysis. Linear regression. Interpretation and applications.

items: Introduction to Statistical Learning by James, Witten, Hastie, Tibshirani
The Signal and the Noise by Nate Silver

content.text: Have questions about statistics? Join our discussion forum to ask for help and discuss statistical concepts.
